language.entry: Darkwraith
I will not join this corrupted spawn of the Dark!
Weaklings! Cling to your fading Light as long as you can!
Reapers collect alone. We will all be brothers in the Abyss soon enough.
Not enough souls out there to sate both of us. I see what I can find here
Fine ... I will fest another day its not like i could starve in the meantime
Undying Rage
Darksword
Unholy Bastion
Grim Reflection
Firebomb
Lifedrain
Unmaking
Move
Undying Rage
Darksword
Unholy Bastion
Grim Reflection
Firebomb
Lifedrain
Unmaking
Why are we resting? We've aught left to kill!
Fine. Let's make this quick.
A moment of respite? How bland.
I hope we get ambushed.
You need rest? Indolent mortals ...
You need rest? Lazy mortals ...
Please do not make the fire too bright ... It's dissgusting
BETRAYAL
An indestructible soul, hidden in thoust weak piece of flesh.
*Shhhhhhh*
You shall perish, I will remain !
Your pain is my nurishment
Pardon me. Sometimes I need to give in to my cruel tendencies
REJECT MORTALITY
My kin is branded by the sign, dark like the deepest abyss.
My face bears scars of a hundret lifetimes
Immortality the oldest trick in the book, literally ...
HARVESTER'S HOUR
And so the hunt begins...
In the dark they fear ME!
Invade! Kill! Pillage!
The Hearth of this world itself is corrupted! Only Dark will remain !!!
Seeking a world to invade...
LIGHTFEASTER
Ahhhhhhhh ... delicious
Keep your "food" mortals
The last time i dined was 4 lifes ago
Ah... Darkness, my old friend. The Reaper hath arrived for you again.
Refills Flask of Agony
Spiked Gauntlet
Boneclaw
Wraithclaw
Abyssal Claw
"Soulrender"
Darkhand
Bone Armor
Rugged Bones
Hardened Bones
Onyx Plating
Obsidian Plating
"Gravelord's Cuirass"

Darkwraiths, once valiant knights are now no more than traitorous undead husk. They seek the prophecy of "The Serpent", and to realize a time of great darkness. Now lordless, their truest strength lies in their independance, no longer needing the help of those still bearing flesh.

A Reaper always hunts at the dead of night. His power borne from their Darkhand Catalyst channeling the corruption of the Abyss. Calling their equipment "armor" could be an overstatement, it's more akin to fossilized flesh and profaned material.

Branded by a curse black as the night, they embraced death. Only through the theft of souls they can prolong their wicked existence. Darkwraiths are cruelsome invaders hunting in the pitchest of blacks. No one is save when they stalk around the corridors of the dungeon.
Shallow Grave

Upon digging a grave for our recently deceased companion, workers found a sealed coffin. After removing the chains we were greated by a rather unlikly ally bein trapped, burried alive below our very feet.
Invade, Kill, Pillage!

The darkwraith st son teh graveyard sharpening his runesword on a nearby gravestone. He seems he doesn't want to be bothered and claims to have some "buisnes" to take care of for the remainder of this week.
Flask of Agony
Use to gain {colour_start|buff}Immunity{colour_end} at {colour_start|deathblow}Death Door{colour_end} for the price of your sanity
Flask of Agony
Bone Wall
Bone Wall
Bone Wall
Bone Wall
Bone Wall
To The Ashes
Grim Resonance
{colour_start|deathblow}Embrace the cold and gentle arms of Death!{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}HAHAHHAHAHA !!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}I thrive where others perish!{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}I am DEATH INCARNATE !!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}Oh sweet death ...{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}Come one try again, I crave it{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}Who do you think you oppse mortal fluke{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}Killing me ? A futile endevour{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}Congratulations you killed me..... And what now ?{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathblow}... pathetic{colour_end}
I don't want to die. Not again, NOT AGAIN!
I have seen Abyss incarnate! Woe and damnation awaits me..
Why couldn't I just have stayed in Lordran...
*Soft Mumbling*
You all wish to fight me for the throne then!?
You curs are dogs of the church here to slay me! Begone foul hounds!
What are you looking at? I'm not one of them.
Stop staring at me cur!
Is that all you've got? Give me a REAL hit.
Pain? Pleasure? Life? Death? All one and the same.
HA HA HA! Again again!
You think I feel anything? Kaathe stole that from me long ago.
You impudent twats, I should drain you where you stand!
Feh.. Why did I ever bother invading with you fools?
Stop soiling yourself and fight!
Useless piles of flesh, maybe I should just end you on the spot... No?
I see that I chose the wrong side of this battle.
Their souls are mine and mine alone!
Pay with blood or gold, it matters not. In the end I'll take all.
Cast aside your gods for I am the next on the DARK THRONE! BOW TO ME!!!
I'm so hungry... Anyone care to sate me? Oh no, not food.
The Abyss calls me... Maybe it is time to answer.
There is naught a chance we'll survive, this I know.
The heart of this world is corrupted, you will see in the end ...
They crawl and bite in the dark, why fight back? Let the feast begin...
HA HA HA HA! YOU'RE ALL HOLLOWED AREN'T YOU!?
DROWNING EVERMORE MY PRETTY GLOWLINGS!
I can't remember where I could remember why I remembered where I was remembering....
Fret not, the church won't find us here ...
I am the Abyss reborn!
I am the Abyss incarnate!
If I am the monster, then what is left for them to be!?
Ha ha ha! They don't stand a chance!
There is nothing to fear! They are nothing but little morsels!
I can see their every movement, the darkness aids them no longer.
The Reaper has come to collect...
I AM FUELED BY THEM! AND NOW IT IS TIME TO CONSUME MORE!
GRAAAAAAHA HA HA!
Replace me!
I have slain the very kings themselves! What are a few abominations in light of that!?
My soul may be empty, but my strenght is limitless.
HA HA HA HA!
THE ABYSS BECKONS!
The dark is OUR ally now!
Do not despair. As the black deepens, my power grows...
Let me give you a taste of REAL power.
Taste a drip of my blood ti expirience real power
LET THE DARKNESS CONSUME YOU FRIENDS!
TRUE POWER OVERWHELMING!
This is nothing! THEY ARE NOTHING!
It's almost time for the feast to begin...
I can't...
I believe it! is time to disengage....
I regret what i've become
Death anever ending cycle I will never escape
The shadows are crawling. This place is alive with evil more potent than mine own!
That stone... it gazes at me! KILL IT !!!!
What if we meet other like me you will not stand a chance !
You don't know what lurks in the dark. I can already see our demise
Again! Again!
Let me feel alive once more!
I am Death itself! What is there to fear in a little pain?
Stand back weaklings!
Useless! All of you!
Your best is my worst.
I'm a little peckish, any takers?
Your grunting and crying is disturbing my focus!
Would you quit your pointles sobbing!?
I shouldn't have...
I've became an abomination
End my suffering agian and again adn again ...
I feel cold. Dark...
*Feverish Mumbling*
Check out this puppy! ISN'T IT DELIGHTFUL!?
Milord milord milord milord milord milord milord...
THEY ARE FLANKING! FALL BACK!
Take that hit for me MORTAL !
Entertain me mortal i will watch from here
GAH!
They will steal whatever essence I have left!
No no no... I don't think so.
STAY AWAY FROM ME, CHURCH SWINE!
Ohohoho, I'm back for more.
I AM IMMORTAL!
FACE YOUR DEMISE !
More please.
8 is arguable the 9th best number in the alphabet, after all.
Ogdar Yaru Oguli OX !
Hey you let me join you thee mortals upset me
The Abyss calls, and I shan't keep it waiting.
The Abyss calls, and I shan't keep it waiting.
The Abyss calls, and I shan't keep it waiting.
Why slow the inevitable? Damnation awaits me.
I suppose it's my turn, isn't it?
I am nothing but a whisper...
Good luck, not like I have any.
Death feels good try it out yourself
I am chosen!
Their souls are looking rather delectable.
I cannot see the enemy! Move over!
I'm not dying AGAIN for you fools!
Pfft.
Not a chance.
Shh... listen.
I fear the final dark hath come..
I... I can't move... protect me you fools!
No no no no, I must wait for the time to strike.
No. Just ... No
If I attack I'll leave an opening for these curs to betray me!
So you can rekindle that obnoxious torch? I think not.
I walk my own path!
No. The time is not yet right.
It's all over now.
Forgive me.
The whisper fades.
A blue sentinal? Likely not, after all the tongues of blue were never there in the end.
Maybe I was wrong, maybe 9 is the 8th best number in the alphabet...
A candle in the dark! Burn, burn, BURN!
Like I'd trust you imbeciles!
I walk my own path, I am the the lord now.
Hands off! I command myself.
That's not how you gut someone, THIS is how.
Ohoho, it's time.
The dogs of the faith did worse!
Pfft.
Let me show you how it is done.
Let me staunch their flame MY way.
Their essence is mine own!
My power came at a great price. I use it as I wish.
IT'S TIME FOR ME TO LEAD!
I am just a shadow in the dark - nothing at all.
I am no hero! Nor am I the villain. I am nothing.
Poor experience begets poor decisions...
SO MANY EYES. SO MANY FACES.
One stunted tree in a fruiting orchard...
Heh. Heheh... HEHEHEHAHHAH. HEHEHAHAHAH.
I see now... Shadows are the children of Light...
They come for me... I can hear the hounds howling.
The bell tolls.
*Mumbling
Conspiracy, all around me...
Traitors...
I have nothing left to steal you fools!
Suffering is the gateway, death is the key to the door.
We die today. How pleasant
I'll strike you all down if you get in my way.
Silence! I can't hear myself think.
... What, you wanted me to talk? to YOU?
I'll be the only one to survive this.
It's time for dinner, "friends".
Boring.
The Abyss beckons, shall we call back?
Dark times, these. Could be darker, shall I get started?
Stop cheating!
Milord, stand down afore they find us!
The Father of Giants... forgive my dexterity.
Not them, ME. I am the only worthy opponent!
HARDER!
I will burn in blackness... And so shall you!
Join me! Join me in the black world, denizens of evil!
Demons, all. You, my mother, my father... all.
I TOLD YOU I CAN PARRY! WATCH ME.
I will not sit idly by and wait for your betrayal!
I can smell deceit. I've lived among much worse than you!
Step one to not being useless, LEARN TO TAKE A HIT!
Useless twat, this'll knock some sense into you.
OHOHO, NO TAGBACKS!
You all seek my virtue! But it is not mine to give!
Closer.. Closer... I can't HEAR you.
The Abyss hungers, now it is time for the feast.
I'll be back later.. Good luck.
I ache for slumber.
FIRE AND DEATH!
MMMM, TINGLY!
The fun is just getting started and you want to leave? Traitor!
No.
It'd just be easier to die...
No. I shall at least die with some dignity.
And leave such a grand opponent? I think not!
I will not go back and suffer your company there! I'd rather suffer here.
I HATE HIDE AND SEEK
Oh yes, time to retreat... JUST KIDDING, FOOL!
Forsaken... forgotten.
You think I can't bleed? Let's test.
The light! It burns!!!
For that, I claim your soul!
Ungh! For these injuries, I require a greater fee!
(deep inhale) Yes... again!
Finally! Real pain!
Mother! MOTHER!
NO! I SAID NO TAGBACKS!
No! No, please, NOOO!
Leave me be! PLEASE!
It was your fault! YOURS!
Just as expected...
You call that a swing?
Tch.
The hissing embers... like a choir of the faithful.
BWAHAHA!
Let me kill it! Its soul must be MINE!
Have you any sense? That was obviously mine!
Pfft.
... I could do better. Given half a chance.
REMEMBER! NO TAGBACKS!
YOU AREN'T EVEN IT!
Oh...
Now I know my end has come....
I know a liar when I see one. You missed on purpose!
Traitor! You could not have missed so easily! TRAITOR!
You'd be more useful as a shard.
Useless...
Yes, distract that one while I do the real work.
Cats, all of them are on the belfry.
The belfry cats are all over me!
See? It calls even to you..
Another death...
Someone has trained them... We have been tricked!
You LET yourself be hit... Why would that be?
Yes... Your pain makes you powerful.
Me! Me next!
I am ashamed to be in your presence.
How uninspiring you are. Sigh.
*Mumbling*
PFFT.
One inch closer and you'd be right where I stand.
Is it time for you to rest? No?
I know a liar when I see one. They missed on purpose!
Traitor! They could not have missed so easily! TRAITOR!
KEEP RUNNING!
*Mumbling*
No..
Not a chance, traitor.
So you can backstab me whilst you pass? I think not.
I will fall here.
My resolve is weak here. I must train it more fully
You think you could possibly help more from here? Hah.
Stay right where you are cur!
NO TAGBACKS!
Darker and darker..
This is obviously poison.
No.
The only true cure is death.
Let me endure it a bit first. It rejuvenates my soul.
It doesn't even matter, save it for later.
Such tawdry goods shant save us now.
I don't need anything, except maybe a fine glass of vinegar!
I have known much darkness. But this seems so very... inky!
I don't trust miracles.
NO!
Don't touch me, cretin.
Useless, the only cure is death!
Take your hands off me... unless you seek to wound me further!
No.
I cannot be given, I alone take.
I am well enough. Go, help the others.
It's full of stars - beautiful and horrifying!
Nonsense! I need only bay leaf and cow urine!
The whip. The cat. The lash. The scourge.
Don't touch me! You started the curse yourselves!
I cannot trust you!
Only death can save me now.
Stay back! My power grows as my wounds mount!
Save your blessings! I don't need them, I never needed them.
Stop. I am tainted enough already...
I descend into the black lake below. I am lost...
You'll make for a fine feast later!
I AM THE DARK!
Bow to your new lord!
You shall suffer as I have!
You dare defy me!?
Say goodnight!
I cannot... feel.
Fiends from the Abyss, you shall not have me!
Must it all end in such blackness?!
*Peculiar Whispers*
Listen well, for I will only say it once.
The ashes of the enemy will clot this foul wound.
You very nearly entered the Light. Come back to the dark, it's safe here.
We have allied the dark, we merely need take its hand.
I see victory in your eyes, though you are blind to it.
Quit pestering me.
No.
Has anyone seen a pouch full of glowing shards?
Is it that time again?
I... I cannot read the ritual while I shudder so...
No.. They will find us if I do.
There's no time for that.
And reveal my secrets? I think not.
A brush with death can truly purify the soul
In my life, suffering has been a potent motivator...
And waste my time with you placid fools?
Pfft.
I don't think I'll waste my time.
I am quite used to keeping what is mine, thank you.
Mine.
The Light cannot illuminate one shrouded in black...
I am tired, and the sunset is beautiful, is it not?
INVALID
INVALID
We are becoming too familiar. I shall cope alone.
No, my burdens are my own.
I can take more yet. Save your folksy charms.
Leave me alone you useless swine.
Tch.
INVALID
INVALID
My life, wasted...
I have defied the vows to my lord... what have I done.
I can't hear you, I've fled this place on wings of light!
No. Poison or not.
My hunger cannot be sated by this!
I decline. The Abyss shall nourish me.
Eating is futile for this body
This would be my last meal, would it not?
Temptation is a wild snake; its venom, my release.
PFFT mortal food.
Mourning Blade: {colour_start|miasma}You are a failure !!!{colour_end}
Mourning Blade: {colour_start|miasma}You are supposed to feed me !!!!{colour_end}
Mourning Blade: {colour_start|miasma}REEEEEEEE!!! How could you miss that{colour_end}
Mourning Blade: {colour_start|miasma}Are you blind ? Take of that stupid mask{colour_end}
Mourning Blade: {colour_start|miasma}My last wielder was more competent{colour_end}
Mourning Blade: {colour_start|miasma}Next time you better hit !{colour_end}
You should undress, your diguise gives me headaches
A Succubus huh ? Wasn't your race purged centuries ago ?
Mindmagic ? Nice trick, doesn't work. Just ask politly
Where did all these shadows come from?
Neat little trick can you teach that to me
Ohh a Strigoi. Centuries I last seen a living one
Radu is that neccesary? Im immortal no need to guard me
Maybe... this will be the one that saves me.
After all... what a wondrous wall.
They're gonna throw it back to you.
